title.en: Ore Dake Mugen Sosei Suru S-Kyuu no Saiyaku Tou

altTitles.ja: 俺だけ無限蘇生するS級の災厄塔

altTitles.en: Only I Can Infinitely Revive The S-class Disaster Tower

title.en: Isshou Watashi no Joshu de ite!

altTitles.ja: 一生わたしの助手でいて！

description.en:
"The relationship between a detective and their assistant is not unlike romance!"

Due to his natural tendency to assist others (a "helper type" personality that makes him constantly want to lend a hand), Mitomo Tasuku had always lived in the shadows. To break out of this, he made it his life's mission to "become number one." However, at the high school he transfers to, he encounters three detective girls, who happen to be his rivals from elementary school with whom he formed a detective club together. Thus begins Tasuku's fierce battle for the top detective spot! However... these girls seem to harbor passionate feelings of a different kind...!?
description.ja: 持ち前の助手体質(つい手助けをしてしまう体質)のせいで日陰者だった御供助玖は、その状況を打破するため「トップになる」ことを最重要課題として生きてきた。しかし、転校先の高校で出会った探偵少女3人は、小学校の頃に探偵団を一緒にやっていた因縁の相手だった! 探偵(トップ)の座をかけた助玖の熱い戦いが始まる!! ただ‥‥彼女たちは違う意味で熱い想いを秘めていて‥‥!?

description.en: "Ah-jin," who was enjoying the game using her younger brother's account, approached the female user [Flower Princess] for the sake of the guild, but ended up being identified as a lurking female. "Actually, I'm a woman...!" Meanwhile, 'Ji-hyeon,' who is secretly active as [Flower Princess], feels that the voice in the video sent by Ah-jin sounds familiar...

altTitles.ja: 二度生きるランカー

altTitles.en: Ranker Who Lives A Second Time

altTitles.th: เกมชีวิตที่สอง ของแรงเกอร์

description.en:
Yeonwoo’s brother disappeared years ago, and he’s devastated to learn of his death.

As he copes with his loss, he’s given a pocket watch and learns there’s more to his brother’s death: he was betrayed while competing in the Tower of the Sun God.

Now it’s Yeonwoo’s turn to use the knowledge his brother left behind.

Can Yeonwoo navigate that world and gain enough power and experience to reach the top of the tower, defeating his brother’s enemies and all those who stand in his way?

---

- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%91%90-%EB%B2%88-%EC%82%AC%EB%8A%94-%EB%9E%AD%EC%BB%A4/2335)
description.fr:
Yeon-woo avait un frère jumeau qui a disparu il y a cinq ans. Un jour, une montre de poche laissée par son frère est retournée en sa possession. À l'intérieur, il a trouvé un journal intime caché dans lequel on pouvait lire : "Le temps que tu entendes ceci, je serai déjà mort…".  
l'Obélisque, la Tour du Dieu Soleil, un monde où plusieurs univers et dimensions se croisent. Dans ce monde, son frère avait été victime d'une trahison en montant la tour. Après avoir appris la vérité, Yeon-woo décida d'escalader la tour avec le journal de son frère.  
Yeon-woo passe ensuite par les mêmes épreuves que son frère cadet et combat en tant que joueur anonyme. Son but ? Vaincre la Tour de l'Obélisque et venger son frère.
description.id: Setelah 5 tahun hilang, Cha Yeonwoo menemukan fakta bahwa adiknya, Cha Jungwoo, sudah meninggal. Ketika membongkar barang peninggalan adiknya, dia menemukan sebuah jam saku. Jam saku itu adalah hadiahnya untuk Jungwoo supaya lulus ujian. Begitu membuka jam tersebut, Cha Yeonwoo mendengar suara adiknya yang menceritakan kehidupannya selama 5 tahun ini. Ternyata Cha Jungwoo bukan hilang melainkan terdampar di dunia lain. Di dunia itu pula Cha Jungwoo dikhianati dan dibunuh. Mendengar itu, amarah Cha Yeonwoo bangkit. Dia berniat balas dendam atas kematian adiknya. Berbekal pengetahuan yang dia dapat dari Jungwoo, Cha Yeonwoo pun pergi ke dunia lain tersebut. Berhasilkah Cha Yeonwoo balas dendam?!
description.it:
Yeon-woo aveva un fratello gemello scomparso cinque anni fa…  
Un giorno, un orologio da tasca lasciato da suo fratello è tornato in suo possesso. Dentro, ha trovato un diario nascosto nel quale è stato registrato “Quando ascolterai questo, immagino che sarò già morto …”
description.ja: ある日豪の元に届いた双子の弟・駿の訃報。 虚無感を感じる彼の元に駿の懐中時計が届く。 そして豪はその中に隠された駿の日記によって、 駿が道半ばで力尽きた太陽神の塔・オベリスクへと誘われていく―。 弟の復讐に燃える豪が挑む、痛快アクションファンタジー！
description.ko:
5년 전 사라진 쌍둥이 동생을 잊고 살던 연우.
어느날 그에게 동생의 유품인 회중시계가 돌아왔다.

그리고 그 속에 숨겨진 일기장.

'형이 이 일기를 들을 때 즈음이라면 나는 이미 이 세상 사람이 아니겠지.'

여러 차원과 우주가 교차하는 세계에 놓인 태양의 신 탑, 오벨리스크.
그리고 그곳에 오르다 배신당해 눈을 감아야 했던 동생.

모든 걸 알게 된 연우는 동생이 남겨 둔 일기와 함께 탑을 오르기 시작한다.

'오늘부터 난. 차정우이다.'
description.ru:
Ёну в течение 5 лет жил, смирившись с исчезновением своего младшего брата-близнеца. Однажды ему в руки попали карманные часы его брата.​ Внутри них он обнаружил спрятанную записку.​ «Брат, если ты сейчас слушаешь эти записи, то меня уже нет на Земле». Узнав о том, что его младший брат отправился в Обелиск — башню богов, которая находится где-то в космосе на пересечении нескольких измерений, и был предан, Ёну решает отправиться туда сам.
«С этого момента я буду Ча Чонъу.​»
description.th: ชายอนอู ชายหนุ่มที่น้องชายหายตัวไป พร้อมกับต้องเสียแม่ไปเพราะโรคร้ายได้ ได้ตัดสินใจไปเป็นทหารอาสาสมัครที่ประเทศแอฟริกา จนอยู่มาวันนึงเขาได้ค้นพบความจริงว่า น้องชายของเขาได้หายตัวไปขณะกำลังตามหา 'ยาอายุวัฒนะ' ของอีกโลกหนึ่ง เพื่อนำมารักษาแม่ พร้อมกับถ่ายโอนพลังทิ้งไว้แก่เขา
description.tr: Yeon-woo’nun kardeşi beş yıl önce ortadan kaybolmuştur. Bir gün kardeşinden kalan bir cep saati eline geçer. İçinde, kardeşinin bırakmış olduğu gizli bir günlüğün olduğunu fark eder. ”Sen bunu bulduğunda, ben çoktan bu dünyadan göçmüş olacağım.” Obelisk, güneş tanrısının kulesi, farklı evrenler ve boyutların iç içe geçtiği bir dünyadır. Kardeşi, bu dünyada kuleye tırmanmaya çalışırken ihanete uğrayıp hayatını kaybetmiştir. Gerçeği öğrenmiş olan Yeon-woo, kardeşinin günlüğü ile birlikte kuleye tırmanmaya karar verir. ”Şu andan itibaren ben, Cha Jeong-woo’yum.”
description.zh-hk:
延宇選擇遺忘5年前消失的雙胞胎弟弟，
過上屬於自己的生活，
卻在某天收到了弟弟的遺物——懷錶。

而在那懷錶之中，還隱藏著弟弟的日誌。

「當哥聽見我的日誌時，
也代表我已經不在這個世界上了吧。」

方尖碑——各個次元與宇宙交會的太陽神之塔。

弟弟就是在攻塔過程中遭受背叛，不幸喪命。

於是，得知一切真相的延宇帶著弟弟留下的日誌，
踏上了攻塔之路!

altTitles.ja: カウンタック

description.en:
The day after he finds himself dumped by his girlfriend, Sorayama Shun receives a letter… from himself? It was written 25 years before for his future self. 
That letter reminds him of the time when he dreamed of owning a Countach and being a successful professional racer. 
With loads of luck and his ambition to make his childhood dream come true, he finds himself as a new owner of an LP400 Countach.

title.en: Guild no Uketsukejou Desu ga, Zangyou wa Iya Nanode Boss wo Solo Toubatsu Shiyou to Omoimasu

altTitles.ja: ギルドの受付嬢ですが、残業は嫌なのでボスをソロ討伐しようと思います

altTitles.en: I May Be a Guild Receptionist, but I'll Solo Any Boss to Clock Out on Time

altTitles.zh: 虽然是公会柜台小姐，但是因为讨厌加班所以要去单挑BOSS

altTitles.en: I'm The Guild Receptionist, But Since I Don't Want To Work Overtime, I Think I'll Just Solo The Boss

description.en:
"It's safe because it's a desk job, super stable because it's public work!"

Alina Clover thought being a receptionist for the Adventurers Guild would be her ticket to the good life... but her dream gig turns into an overtime nightmare whenever adventurers get stuck clearing a dungeon. To save herself from paperwork, Alina turns to the simplest solution at hand — beating down the monsters herself! A mysterious adventurer showing up out of nowhere, soloing the boss, then disappearing without taking credit is bound to create rumors, and Alina's treasured job forbids side hustles. So there might be trouble when the leader of the Silver Sword party discovers her secret...!
description.ja:
内勤だから安全、公務だから超安定！

そんな理想の職業「ギルドの受付嬢」となったアリナを待っていたのは、理想とは程遠い残業三昧の日々だった。

全てはダンジョンの攻略が滞っているせい！ 限界を迎えたアリナは、なんと大鎚を手に自らボス討伐に赴くのであった―。

title.en: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden:  Kikuri Hiroi's Heavy Drinking Diary

altTitles.ja: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！外伝　廣井きくりの深酒日記

altTitles.en: Bocchi the Rock! Side Story: Hiroi Kikuri's Heavy Drinking Diary

altTitles.ja-ro: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden: Hiroi Kikuri no Fukazake Nikki

description.en:
25 years old Kikuri Hiroi is a "genius bassist" who leads the indie band "SICK HACK" and loves alcohol. 
She often gets drunk and breaks the equipment inside concert clubs, so she's often short of money. 
She lives in a 52-year-old bathless apartment so she borrows showers from her friends sometimes. 
Regularly attacked by anxiety about her future, she counters that with a alcohol-fueled "happiness spiral". 
What is her daily life like...?!

This is a story about the Valkyries living in the dorm and their culinary adventures. Each valkyrie has a different specialty but they all share the same desire to convey their feelings to their loved ones through cooking.  

---

Valkyries are more than warriors. They are also exquisite chefs and connoisseurs of fine living. Study from these masters of the kitchen because their recipes actually churn out delicious gourmet food!

---

description.zh: 这是回到宿舍的女武神们，发生在她们身上的和食物有关的故事。女武神们做的料理各不相同，但是其中蕴含的心意，对重要的人想要传达的思念，却是相通的。

altTitles.ja: Mコレクション

description.en: This tongue-in-cheek semi-autobiography follows the absurdly gruesome adventures of a lonely boy and his singularly crazed family. His escape from the madness that surrounds him is his collection of pickled animal and human body parts, to which he adds as one family member after another meet with a grotesque and sometimes terrifyingly funny death... (Source: AniList)

title.en: S-Rank Monster no Behemoth Dakedo, Neko to Machigawarete Erufu Musume no Kishi (Pet) Toshite Kurashitemasu

altTitles.en: I Am Behemoth Of The S Rank Monster, But I Am Mistaken As A Cat And I Live As A Pet Of Elf Girl
I'm a “Behemoth,” an S-Ranked Monster, But Mistaken for a Cat, I Live As an Elf Girl's Pet
I’m an S-Rank "Behemoth" Monster, but I’m Living as a Knight (Pet) of an Elf Girl

altTitles.es: Soy un monstruo de rango S, Behemoth, pero me confundieron con un gato y ahora vivo como el caballero (mascota) de una chica elfa.

altTitles.ja: Sランクモンスターの《ベヒーモス》だけど、猫と間違われてエルフ娘の騎士(ペット)として暮らしてます
Sランクモンスターの《ベヒーモス》だけどネコと間違われてエルフ娘の騎士として暮らしています

altTitles.de: Ich bin ein mächtiger Behemoth und lebe als Kätzchen bei einer Elfe

altTitles.ru: Я монстр S-класса Бегемот, но меня перепутали с котом, и я живу у эльфийки как домашний питомец

altTitles.zh: 虽然是S级魔兽“比蒙巨兽” 却以猫的模样、成为精灵娘的骑士的日常

description.en: The elven girl Aria is a stunning and swift adventurer. When a small cat-like beast with an adorable face embraces Aria's fruitful chest during a dungeon exploration, she decides to keep it as a pet and names it "Tama". At first sight it's just an average cat, but Aria has yet to notice that Tama is a reincarnated chivalrous former Knight and that its identity is not that of a cat, but of a young monster of the strongest class "Behemoth".
description.es:
La chica elfa, "Aria" es una aventurera. Cuando una pequeña bestia con una cara adorable abraza el fructífero pecho de Aria, ella decide tenerla como mascota y la llama "Tama". A primera vista es sólo un gato común, pero Aria aún no se ha dado cuenta de que Tama es un antiguo Caballero y que su identidad no es un gato, sino un joven monstruo de la clase más fuerte "Behemoth".  
  
**Links:**  
- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9107ee) (Raw)  
- [Official Light Novel (EN)](https://yenpress.com/9781975332945/im-a-behemoth-an-s-ranked-monster-but-mistaken-for-a-cat-i-live-as-an-elf-girls-pet-vol-1-light-novel/)
description.pt: A garota elfa, "Aria" é uma aventureira. Uma pequena besta com um adorável rosto abraça o peito frutoso da Aria, ela decide manter como um animal de estimação chamado "Tama". Ao primeiro sinal é apenas um gato comum, mas Aria ainda não notou que esta Tama é um cavaleiro antigo e sua identidade não é de um gato, mas um jovem monstro da classe mais poderosa chamada "Behemoth".

altTitles.ja: 佐々田は友達

description.en:
Yuki Takahashi attends Chabatake High School. Life is a series of party chances and she loves to have fun. Emi Sasada, who also attends Chabatake High School. She is a 16 year old who loves canned snakes and praying mantis and is still uncertain of her own form. The two of them, who were at the farthest end of the class, meet by chance one day after school and...?

This is the kind of manga that makes you think, "maybe my memories of high school, which had been so dull, weren't so bad after all."

title.en: Slime Blossom: A Reincarnated Genius in a New World

altTitles.ja: スライム桜は異世界に咲く

description.en: Taiga Hiiragi, a delinquent, lived a life consumed by daily brawls. One day, Noel, a genius slime reincarnated from another world, appears before him. When Taiga finds himself in a pinch during a fight, Noel uses his intellect to help him out. Then Noel declares to Taiga, “Slimes and Yankees(delinquents) should go to Tokyo University!!” Noel claims he’s here to help Taiga pass the Tokyo University entrance exam, but…?

altTitles.ja: 夜の命名法

altTitles.vi: Mệnh Danh Thuật Của Bóng Tối

description.en: In the blue and purple neon, under the dense steel sky, the front end of the data torrent is the world after the technological revolution, and it is also the boundary between reality and illusion. Steel and body, past and future. Here, the outer world and the inner world coexist, and everything in front of you is like a wall of time. Darkness gradually shrouded. But you have to understand, my friend, that we cannot deal with darkness with tenderness, but with fire.
description.zh: 蓝与紫的霓虹中，浓密的钢铁苍穹下，数据洪流的前端，是科技革命之后的世界，也是现实与虚幻的分界。 钢铁与身体，过去与未来。 这里，表世界与里世界并存，面前的一切，像是时间之墙近在眼前。 黑暗逐渐笼罩。 可你要明白啊我的朋友，我们不能用温柔去应对黑暗，要用火。

description.en: This is a story about friends, & their evolving relationships through school. Our main protagonist in this story follows Hideo Asano, a student & his friends. His younger brother Mitsuru, His Christian Childhood friend Ayaka, who loves him. His gaming classmates, Kou & Shoji, Ayaka's friends Kohaku & Haruko & many others as the series goes on.

altTitles.ja: 残り火の騎士

altTitles.th: เพลิงแค้นของอัศวิน

description.en:
When Nagyunn’s twin brother, Najin, is murdered before his very eyes, he vows to avenge his brother’s death by assuming Najin’s identity. 

But although the two may look alike, when it comes to fighting, Nagyunn lacks the talent and skill his brother possessed. In order to successfully execute his plot for revenge, Nagyunn resolves to train himself to become the prodigious knight-in-training his brother once was. 

Will Nagyunn be able to keep his identity a secret before others begin to catch on to his act?

Мой брат-близнец, единственный член семьи, восходящая звезда и главный кандидат на становление рыцарем, был убит. В отличие от него, у меня совсем не было таланта к боевым искусствам. Однако ради того, чтобы отомстить за своего брата, я должен стать сильнее.

description.th:
น้องชายฝาแฝดของฉันเป็นผู้เข้าสอบอัศวินที่เก่งที่สุดในประเทศถูกลอบสังหาร ฉันซึ่งไม่มีความสามารถในการต่อสู้เลยนั้น ตัดสินใจแล้วว่าจะแกล้งปลอมตัวเป็นน้องชายที่แข็งแกร่งของฉันเพื่อแก้แค้นแทนเขา ตัวฉันที่อ่อนแอจะสามารถแก้แค้นคนที่ฆ่าน้องชายของฉันได้หรือไม่

description.zh:
弟弟是最强骑士却被杀害？
软弱的我为复仇假扮弟弟！
某天，洛辰洛谦两兄弟家里来了一伙神秘人，他们企图杀害弟弟洛辰。洛辰是整个大陆最有实力的预备骑士，而洛谦却是一个手无缚鸡之力的少年。危机时刻洛辰为了保护哥哥丧命于家中。哥哥洛谦为了查明真相，找出真凶，于是假扮成弟弟成为了一名骑士。但哥哥洛谦并没有骑士资质，他只能依靠伪装骗过众人，同时寻找神秘人为弟弟报仇。软弱的洛谦可以成功找到真相为弟弟复仇吗？

altTitles.ja: 廻天のアルバス

description.en:
The Demon King was defeated. The world is at peace. But… it was too late.

Hero Albus is in a hurry. The story turns and begins again, as if naturally, from the place where it all started. The well-informed hero Albus embarks on a new adventure, where time is of the essence. 

Time-saving! Efficient adventure strategy! When recruiting a priest, be forceful! It doesn’t matter if you are mistaken for a new kind of scam. And suddenly, he challenges an S-class dangerous monster. 

Hero Albus seeks to reclaim the future he desires from the past in this ultra-fast readventure (real-time attack) fantasy!
description.ja: 魔王を倒した。世界は平和に。でも、間に合わなかった。なぜかこの冒険を繰り返している勇者アルバスは、急ぎたい。これは世界を救う物語であり、そして――
description.vi:
Ma vương đã bị đánh bại... Thế giới sẽ hòa bình trở lại. Nhưng... Đã quá muộn rồi... Anh hùng Albus thật sự đang rất vội. Câu chuyện tua ngược, như thể một cách tự nhiên, trở lại nơi mọi chuyện khởi đầu.

Người anh hùng đầy hiểu biết Albus với đôi mắt lờ đờ như thiếu ngủ, dấn thân vào một cuộc phiêu lưu mới, nơi “thời gian là thứ quan trọng nhất”.

Được đăng dài kỳ trên Weekly Shounen Sunday, nơi đã đăng tải siêu phẩm “Thám tử lừng danh Conan”, người Anh hùng Albus tìm cách giành lại tương lai mà anh ấy mong muốn từ quá khứ trong thế giới fantasy “speedrun” một cách đúng nghĩa này!
description.es-la: El Rey Demonio es derrotado... El mundo está en paz. Pero fue demasiado tarde... El héroe Albus tiene prisa. La historia da vueltas y comienza de nuevo desde el principio, como si fuera algo natural. ¡Esta es una fantasía de re-aventura de alta velocidad donde "el tiempo es lo más importante" para el experto héroe Albus.

altTitles.ja: パンプキンナイト

description.en: After escaping from a mental institution, a girl with a self-inflicted facial deformity enacts twisted justice on those who mistreated her, face hidden underneath the disguise of a pumpkin.
description.es: Una deforme chica sale con una calabaza en su cabeza para matar a todos aquellos que la acosaron en su pasado después de escapar de un manicomio.
description.fr: Victime de sévices orchestrés aux yeux de tous par ses camarades de classe, une collégienne a été interné dans un hôpital psychiatrique. Plusieurs mois plus tard, alors que ses bourreaux sont aujourd’hui au lycée, ils apprennent qu’elle s’est échappée en tuant tout le personnel hospitalier qui a tenté de lui barrer la route et qu’elle est bien décidé à se venger d’eux.
description.ja: ある日、女子高生・中谷明日美は、SNSで「パンプキンナイト」という見知らぬアカウントからフォローされる。『中谷明日美コロス』というメッセージが届いた直後、カボチャのマスクを被った殺人鬼に襲われ惨死する。 そして偶然、明日美と通話していた和也にも死の宣告が突きつけられ……。
description.kk: Бет әлпеті қатты зақымданған, оқушы қыз, бұрын оны келеке еткен адамдардың жандарын алу үшін, ауруханадан қашып шығады.
description.pt: Uma mulher deformada sai com uma abóbora na cabeça para matar todos aqueles que a maltrataram no passado depois de escapar de um hospital psiquiátrico.
description.pt-br: Uma mulher deformada sai com uma abóbora na cabeça para matar todos aqueles que fizeram bullying com ela no passado depois de escapar de um hospital psiquiátrico.

title.en: Ore ni Trauma wo Ataeta Joshi-tachi ga Chirachira Mitekuru kedo, Zannen desu ga Teokure desu

altTitles.ja: 俺にトラウマを与えた女子達がチラチラ見てくるけど、残念ですが手遅れです

altTitles.en: The Girls Who Traumatized Me Keeps Glancing at Me, but Alas, It’s Too Late

altTitles.es-la: Las chicas que me traumaron me están mirando, pero desafortunadamente es demasiado tarde.

description.en: Kokonoe Yukito has always been unlucky when it comes to women. He was rejected by his childhood friend, which he thought they had mutual feelings for each other. His sister hates him. His mother neglected him. Due to all these trauma stacking with each other, his emotions were completely destroyed. When Yukito enters high school, the girls who inflicted these pain on him started to care for him...?!
description.ja: 九重雪兎は昔から女運が悪い。両想いだと思っていた幼馴染にはフラれ、姉には嫌われ、母親には疎まれ――度重なるトラウマの果てに感情がぶっ壊れてしまう。そんな雪兎が高校に入学したら、彼にトラウマを与えてきた女子達がやたらと彼のことを気にかけてきて……!?　手遅れから始まる勘違い思春期ラブコメ、開幕！
description.es-la:
Yukito Kokonoe siempre ha tenido mala suerte. Es odiado por su madre, su hermana, y su amiga de la infancia, pensaba que tenían sentimientos mutuos, pero ella se siente frustrada antes de la confesión, e incluso hace travesuras durante sus heridas, y sus emociones se rompen después de repetidos traumas con muchas mujeres.

Sin embargo, cuando ingresó a la escuela preparatoria, ¿¡Las chicas que lo traumatizaron comenzaron a preocuparse por él ...!?
Esta es una comedia romántica de un adolescente incomprendido que comienza demasiado tarde.

title.en: Yumizuka Iroha wa Tejun ga Daiji!

altTitles.en: Technique Is Everything to Yumizuka Iroha!
The Process Is Important for Iroha Yumizuka
Yumizuka Iroha's No Good Without Her Procedure!

altTitles.ja: 弓塚いろはは手順が大事！

altTitles.zh: 弓塚同学今天也依旧脱靶

description.en: Yumizuka-san grew up as the daughter of one of Japan's leading families of archery. But she had a secret about her seemingly perfect life! A tempestuous romantic comedy about a captivating archer!

title.en: Bokura no Ai wa Kimochi Warui

altTitles.ja: 僕らのアイは気持ち悪い

altTitles.ja-ro: Bokura no Ai wa Kimochi Warui

description.en:
Everyone is hiding a "secret."

Azuki Komugi is obsessed with ruminating on her memories of her high school girlfriend "Meguru," and creating a body model of hers out of clay.

One day, Azuki drops her homemade "Meguru" at the 100-yen shop where she works part-time, and sneaks into her workplace on her off-shift to get "her" back. However, what she sees there is a fellow co-worker, high school girl Yoyuki Remu, who is about to express her lust for "Meguru" in a way that is different from Azuki's...

altTitles.ja: 後ろの、センパイ

description.en: A car date with my favourite senpai ♡
description.ja: 大好きなセンパイとドライブデート♡

title.en: The Menhera Rabbit Is Adored by the Yandere Wolf

altTitles.ja: メンヘラうさぎはヤンデレ狼に溺愛される

description.en: A dangerous and twisted love between a menhera girl x yandere boy!? Tsumugi is a menhera girl who's been dumped by a string of boyfriends for being too clingy. Her last boyfriend got angry at her for sneakily looking through his phones and kicked her out of the house. And that's when Itoshi, the super kind younger guy who completely accepts her, comes to the rescue. His gentle comfort soothes Tsumugi's broken heart, however, there's something he's hiding...!?
description.ja: メンヘラ女子×ヤンデレ男子の危険で歪な恋!?　つむぎは歴代彼氏に「重すぎる」と捨てられてきたメンヘラ女子。彼氏のスマホを勝手に覗き怒られ、家から追い出されてしまう。そんな時助けてくれたのは、自分を全肯定してくれる超優しい年下の男の子、愛士。彼の優しい慰めで傷ついた心が安らぐつむぎだったが、愛士には秘密があって…!?

title.en: Shigoto Kaeri, Dokushin no Bijin Doushi ni Tanomarete

altTitles.ja: 仕事帰り、独身の美人上司に頼まれて

altTitles.en: On My Way Home from Work, My Beautiful Single Boss Asked Me to Do Something for Her
On my way home from work, my beautiful single boss asked me to do something for her.

altTitles.ja-ro: Shigotogaeri, Dokushin no Bijin Joushi ni Tanomarete

description.en:
One day, a young clerk named Haruhiko was suddenly asked by his boss to do one thing: get her pregnant.

“We have nothing to do with anything else… We just have to do it, that is, you have to get me pregnant, and I have your baby.

The loveless relationship between the two had begun. Although the condition was not to fall in love with each other, the distance between the two gradually narrowed.

The romance story between a typical worker and a divorced female boss. It has officially begun.
description.ja:
「お願い……。私のこと、抱いてほしい」
若手社員の実沢春彦は、会社で『女帝』と恐れられる厳格な上司・桃生結子から、飲み会帰りホテルへと誘われた。戸惑う実沢に、彼女は恥じらいながらお願いする――。

「私と……子作りだけしてくれないかしら？」

誰にも言えない、恋愛なしの男女の関係が始まる。女上司が俺にだけ見せる顔。好きになってはならないルール。
それなのに俺達は徐々に惹かれ合い――。美人上司と部下、禁断と背徳の大人ラブコメ開幕！

title.en: Watashi ga Motenai no wa Dou Kangaetemo Omaera ga Warui!

altTitles.en: It's Not My Fault That I'm Not Popular

altTitles.ja: わたモテ
私がモテないのはどう考えてもお前らが悪い!

altTitles.ko: 내가 인기 없는 건 아무리 생각해도 너희들 탓이야!

altTitles.th: สาวมืดมนอลวนหารัก

altTitles.es-la: No importa como lo vea, ¡Es culpa suya que yo no sea popular!

altTitles.en: WataMote: No Matter How I Look at It, It's You Guys' Fault I'm Not Popular!

altTitles.pt-br: Não É Minha Culpa Não Ser Popular!

description.en:
Tomoko Kuroki naturally assumed she'd be popular when she got to high school... but then cold, hard reality swooped in for the attack! Turns out all the popularity points she's racked up in her video game dating sims are worth squat in real life, and Tomoko's far from prepared to navigate high school! 

How can she possibly hope to impress her classmates when she can't even talk to them?! A new high-school heroine is born (maybe?)!
description.pl: Główna bohaterka serii – Kuroki Tomoko – jest ultra-popularną uczennicą liceum, która umówiła się już z ponad setką chłopaków… W grach Otome. W realnym świecie jest socjopatką, która zupełnie nie radzi sobie z komunikacją z innymi ludźmi, a w szczególności z płcią przeciwną. Manga opowiada o jej kuriozalnych próbach (z reguły niezbyt udanych) usocjalnienia się i zmienienia się w osobę bardziej popularną.
description.es-la: Kuroki Tomoko, una chica que tiene "50 años de experiencia" en citas y que ha salido con más de un centenar de chicos… en juegos otome. En la vida real acaba de cumplir 15 años y va a dar comienzo su época en el instituto, está convencida de que con sus conocimientos será la más de popular. Una vez comienza el instituto, comienzan a pasar los días y se da cuenta de que no habla con nadie. ¿Cómo es posible? Un simple vistazo al espejo le hace darse cuenta de la realidad: no es precisamente una belleza y parece que hasta puede ser antipática. Poco a poco intentará cambiar para ser popular, pero claro, entre lo que le cuesta y lo que tiene una idea bastante distorsionada de la realidad, no será tan sencillo.
description.pt-br:
Tomoko Kuroki naturalmente presumiu que ela seria popular quando chegasse ao ensino médio... mas então a realidade fria e dura se abateu para o ataque! Acontece que todos os pontos de popularidade que ela acumulou em seus simuladores de namoro de videogame valem a pena na vida real, e Tomoko está longe de estar preparada para passar pelo ensino médio!

Como ela pode esperar impressionar seus colegas quando ela nem consegue falar com eles?! Nasce uma nova heroína do ensino médio (talvez?)!

altTitles.es: ¡La Pandilla del Amor Puro de Shonan!

altTitles.th: คู่คนลุยเลอะ!

altTitles.ja: しょうなん じゅんあいぐみ!
湘南純愛組!

description.en: Eikichi Onizuka and Ryuji Danma are members of infamous biker gang, Oni Baku. When not out riding around, they can be found in school, trying to pick up young women. This is the story of the young Onizuka, who would later become the greatest teacher in Japan.
description.pt: Antes de Eikichi Onizuka se tornar "Great Teacher Onizuka", ele e Ryuji Danma eram membros da infame gangue de motoqueiros, OniBaku. Quando eles não saem andando por aí se metendo em confusões, esta dupla pode ser encontrada na escola, tentando pegar garotas, claro. Essa é a história de como surgiu a lenda do OniBaku e como era a vida de Onizuka e Ryuji em seu tempo de colegiais.

description.en:
Tang San was a talented apprentice to the great Tang Sect. Due to mastering the forbidden Tang arts, he was pressured to jump off a cliff and died. However, he was reborn into another world filled with Essence Spirits. At the age of six, every person will have their essence spirit awoken. Spirits can take many forms: weapons, plants, and animals; They can help people with their daily lives. Outstanding spirits can be trained to engage in combat. A spirit master is the soul and heart of the Combat Continent! When Tang San turns six, a huge surprise awaits him. His peaceful life in this new world will change completely.

Note: After the original chapter 344, it continued on from a re-written 322.

altTitles.es: No me lo digas con flores

altTitles.ja: 花より男子

altTitles.en: Hana Yori Dango: Boys Over Flowers

altTitles.ja: 流星花园

description.en:
Eitoku Academy is a school that caters to children and from rich, high-society families. Hence, Makino, who comes from a poor family, is considered by others as the "weed" of the school. The school is ruled by the "Flower Four" group, more commonly known as the F4. The F4 leader, and son of the wealthiest, most powerful family in Japan, Domyouji Tsukasa, takes an interest in Tsukushi because she is the only girl at Eitoku who does not fawn over him. However, his hot-headed nature and bullying ways are originally a major turn-off for Tsukushi, who has her sights set on Rui Hanazawa.  
  
Volume 37 is comprised of three short stories that happen after the ending

altTitles.ja: 官能先生

description.en:
Narumi Rokurou is still adrift in life in his forties, unmarried, and working as an editor at a publishing company while writing hardly lucrative literary fiction. His days enjoying life at his own pace are brought to an end one summer night, when a strange twist of fate brings Rokurou together with a mysterious beauty, beginning the story of their crazed love.   
As once was spoken by Zarathustra: "Everything in a woman is a riddle."

altTitles.ja: 路傍のフジイ

description.en:
Is he an eccentric or a hermit? Does the seemingly unremarkable company employee, Fujii, redefine the definition of "happiness"?

In the workplace, he's a plain middle-aged man who doesn't stand out. While he does his job properly, he's not one to waste words. Come quitting time, he disappears like a ghost. He's not the type to be invited to after-work drinks in the first place. More like, he's the guy who's thought of as "I wouldn't want to end up like that..." by his juniors.

Yet, he piques the curiosity of others... "I wonder how he was raised?", "Does he have friends or a girlfriend?", "What does he do on weekends?". Suddenly, you realize you've become captivated by Fujii... 

This elusive emotion that's hard to put into words is vividly captured by the author of "Reborn no Kishi" in this bewitching life drama!

altTitles.ja: 黒羊の歩み

description.en: The protagonist, Asahi, returns to her hometown after seven years. On her first day at the new school, Asahi is happy to be reunited with her beloved childhood friend, Haruhiko, but she soon sees something terrifying outside the window. At that moment, the classroom is enveloped in a strange atmosphere...
description.ja: この町の人々は【何か】を隠しているー… ７年ぶり生まれた故郷に帰ってきた主人公・朝陽。 大好きな幼馴染・晴彦に久々に再会し心踊らせていた。 緊張しながらも転校初日が過ごせそうと思った矢先、 朝陽は窓の外に＜恐ろしいもの＞を見てしまうー…。

title.en: Soul Land II - The Peerless Tang Sect

altTitles.en: Đấu La Đại Lục 2 - Tuyệt Thế Đường Môn
Soul Land 2 - The Peerless Tang Sect
斗罗大陆2 - 绝世唐门
Soul Land II - The Unrivaled Tang Sect
Soul Land 2 - The Unrivaled Tang Sect

description.en:
A land without magic, dou-qi, martial arts, but with essence spirits instead. This is the continent 10,000 years after the formation of the Tang Sect. A new hero and his friend walk the land, a new "Seven Monsters of Shriek." Will they keep up the name of the Tang Sect? Or will it crumble due to a new essence system?  

---

**Notes:**
- This is Soul Land's sequel, but you don't have to read it before reading this. There might be spoilers though.
- Starting at chapter 181, the manhua format changes to long strip.

A dazzling survival band audition, youth? Revenge? Well, the only thing for sure is… ‘As long as I’m here, you won’t debut gracefully.’ My brother, Ha Seong-woo, a famous singer-songwriter, was murdered. The killer was Baek Do-hyung, my brother’s friend and colleague. The moment I found out, I, Ha Su-in, also died in an unexpected accident… After a moment of excruciating pain, I opened my eyes to find myself back 5 years ago, when my brother died. This second chance, I won’t just stand by and watch like before. I’m going to enter <PICK BAND 2>, the follow-up season of the audition my brother won and the grand debut stage for the killer Baek Do-hyung, and ruin everything. Just me? No, I’ll gather geniuses that no one can mess with. After all, I’ve replayed this audition hundreds of times.

title.en: Lalalab☆ ~Gal to Kagaku to Seishun to!~

altTitles.ja: ラララボ☆ ～ギャルと科学と青春と！～

altTitles.en: Lala Lab ⭐︎ Gyaru, Science, and Youth!

description.en: Lala Mizusawa might look like a flashy gyaru and act high-energy, but don’t be fooled—she’s a hardcore science geek and a third-year biology major with dreams of becoming a great scientist! While her lofty goal sometimes shakes her confidence, she’s got her quirky labmates to keep her going: the refined and otaku-spirited Hanako Naito, and the lazy pajama-wearing Toki Busujima. Together, they celebrate the thrill of growing microbes, steam sweet potatoes in the autoclave, and dive headfirst into their delightfully chaotic campus life (if you can call it that)! ☆
description.ja: 水沢ララは、ギャルい見た目とハイテンションで誤解されがちだけど、“偉大な科学者”を目指すガチ理系の大学3年生(理学部生物学科)！大きすぎる目標に自信喪失する日もあるけど、オタク気質のお嬢様・内藤花恋、パジャマ登校のずぼらっ子・毒島ときという個性豊かな研究室仲間と、菌が増えて喜んだり、高圧蒸気滅菌器で芋を蒸かしたり…キャンパスライフ（？）だって満喫中☆

altTitles.ja: ミナミの帝王

description.en: Centers around Ginjirou Manda, a loan shark who charges toichi — 10% more interest every 10 days, or 365% every year. Thanks to his unrelenting money-collecting tactics, he is feared as "Minami no Oni" or the "Demon" of Osaka's Minami business district.
description.it: La storia narra di Ginjirou Manda, uno strozzino che applica degli interessi sui debiti del 10% ogni dieci giorni, o del 365% ogni anno. Grazie alle sue tecniche di recupero crediti inesorabili, è conosciuto come il "Demone di Minami", che è il quartiere commerciale di Osaka.

altTitles.ja: きみのためのエデン

description.en:
"Please... Kiss Me"

The young man, Yuusei Hakozaki, carries the memory of being kidnapped and confined along with six girls during his childhood. One day, as an adult leading a peaceful life, a girl suddenly appears before him and demands a kiss...!?

Yuusei is told of a single "rule": He must kiss the girls once every 24 hours. If he fails to do so, their heads will explode and they will die.

To save the girls from their deadly fate, Yuusei starts a communal life with them where he must "kiss them every day." In this closed-off miniature Eden, the story begins to unfold. Can Yuusei discern their lies and truths and find his one destined partner?
description.id: "Tolong ― Cium Aku"Hakozaki Yuuki, seorang pemuda yang dihantui kenangan tentang penculikan dan penyekapan bersama enam gadis sewaktu kecil, menjalani kehidupan tenang dan biasa sebagai orang dewasa. Namun, ketenangannya hancur ketika salah satu gadis tersebut tiba-tiba muncul di depannya dan memintanya untuk menciumnya!Yuuki dihadapkan pada satu aturan mengerikan:Dia harus mencium setiap gadis itu sekali dalam 24 jam.Jika dia gagal melakukannya, kepala mereka akan meledak, menyebabkan kematian mereka.Bertekad untuk menyelamatkan mereka dari nasib tragis ini, Yuuki memulai hidup bersama dengan para gadis tersebut, dengan misi "mencium mereka setiap hari." Di tengah kehidupan bersama dalam dunia yang tertutup ini, cerita mulai terungkap.Di balik kebohongan dan kebenaran para gadis, Yuuki harus memahami perasaan mereka yang sebenarnya dan mengungkap rahasia masa lalu mereka. Bisakah dia menemukan satu-satunya takdir sejatinya?

description.en: A world where gates open and monsters come out to play— Hyunsoo longs to enter the tower and take on the role a sa hunter. But in reality, he works as a porter and meat shield of E Class Hunters who are worse than gangsters. Moreover, he was taken advantage by this hunters to the point where he was about to meet death. As soon as he thought that he was dead, he was summoned to the tower, was revived back from the dead, and began climbing up the tower to become a hunter that he had been longing to be. Depending on how much coins one has, the tower offers them the chance to challenge it. Hyunsoo looks at the number of coins he has…. [You have an infinite number of coins!] “Then I’ll awaken myself in the 100th floor and go home!!!” Hyunsoo, who is stucked in the tower, begins his conquer!

description.en:
***Winner of the 25th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize for "Short Story!***

A highly discussed and polarizing work that delves into marital issues, sparking major media reactions!

*Why is my wife angry...?*

A husband who thought he was living a peaceful life with his wife, daughter, and son as a typical four-person family suddenly finds himself in an unspoken crisis. One day, his wife stops talking to him. Days turn into weeks, and eventually, this wordless existence stretches into six years. There's no memory of a major fight, and household chores and childcare continue as usual. The only difference? Beyond the bare minimum of necessary communication, his wife doesn't speak to him at all.

Originally serialized to great acclaim on the *Yomitai* website, this much-anticipated book includes the shocking final chapter written exclusively for this release.

description.en:
Name’s Inori Takafuji. I’m not really much of a “go-getter,” if you catch my drift — sleep’s more my style — but getting summoned to another world kinda messed things up.

Bit hard to chill when you’ve got a king in your face telling you there’s a bad guy you’ve gotta go slay or whatever, you know? Plot twist, though — it’s actually not so bad. Getting the hero treatment sounds pretty nice, right?

But then it happens again! Some other clown summons me, I get my obligatory superpower, and off I go. And sure, that’s fine. It happens, sometimes you get isekai’d to the wrong place. But then it happens AGAIN! Someone ELSE summons me, I get ANOTHER superpower, and then I’m somewhere totally new.

Repeat ad nauseam.

No idea what’s going on, but all I want is one thing: stop !@#$ing summoning me!

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/oversummoned-overpowered-and-over-it)
description.vi: Học sinh trung học Takafuji  được triệu hồi đến một thế giới khác với các bạn cùng lớp. Ngay khi bản thân nghĩ rằng một cuộc sống mới isekai với cái mô típ quen thuộc tiêu diệt ma vương,thì bỗng cái BÙM,một vòng tròn ma thuật xuất hiện dưới chân Prairie !? ngoại trừ hắn là người duy nhất được triệu hồi đến một thế giới thứ hai.rồi sau đó thế méo nào lại tiếp tục được triệu hồi, và lại một lần nữa... Sau nhiều lần triệu hồi, thứ còn lại trong tay main là khả năng gian lận hàng loạt cấp anh hùng

description.en:
After the fall of the empire due to the homunculi, Evienrose, the 7th Princess, dies after drinking poison given by her younger sister who has taken their side. When she opens her eyes again, she has returned 8 years to the past. To stop the fall of the imperial family, Eve decides to turn 'Mikhael', the leader of the homunculi and the 'Monster of the Floating Prison', into her appointed knight.

"Mikhael, I need you, very much."

---
Princess Evienrose, despite advocating fiercely for the rights of the homunculi rebels, now awaits death at their hands… that is until she is poisoned by her own sister! Awakening eight years in the past, Eve now has one goal: become the Empress and liberate the homunculi to stop the rebellion from ever happening! To do this, she appoints the rebel king himself, Mikaelis Agnito, as her personal knight. But with Eve’s scheming sisters standing in the way, the fight for the crown is on, and the fate of the Hadelamid empire rests in her hands!

---
The seventh imperial princess, Evenrose, once died. Her last memory was of the royal family was destroyed by the Homunculus, the rebelling slaves, and of her sister who had sided with the rebels and urged her to escape her painful execution by swallowing poison. But when she opened her eyes again, "I...I'm not dead." She realizes that she had gone eight years back in time, back to a time before her cruel sister Bridgette was chosen as the next emperor. Given the opportunity to prevent the fall of the imperial family by being chosen as the next emperor herself, she decides to write her own article about Michael, the king of Homunculus and the monster of public prison, in order to win the emperor's heart. "I need you, Michael. Very badly." Will Evenrose be able to get him and protect the imperial family safely?

---

description.es:
La séptima princesa imperial, Evenrose, murió una vez.Su último recuerdo fue cuando la familia real fue destruida por el Homúnculo, quien provocó la traición y se ahogó en el plan de su hermano parado de su lado, al tragar veneno. Pero cuando volvió a abrir los ojos,"Yo ... no estoy muerto."Se da cuenta de que ha vuelto al pasado y que era ocho años más joven. Fue antes de que el tercer emperador, que será el próximo heredero, fuera elegido oficialmente como sucesor. Una oportunidad para evitar la caída de la familia imperial presionando al tercer emperador Bridgette y siendo reconocida como sucesora. Como parte de la preparación, Evenrose decidió escribir su propio artículo sobre Michael, el rey de Homunculus y el monstruo de la prisión pública, para ganarse el corazón del emperador."Te necesito, Michael. Muy desesperadamente."¿Podrá Evenrose atraparlo y proteger a la familia imperial de manera segura?

---

description.fr:
Il était une fois, un royaume où grâce à une alchimie interdite, des homonculus étaient créés.

Ces homonculus devaient se soumettre à la volonté de la famille Impériale à l’aide d’une magie d’asservissement. Les plus doués d’entre eux faisaient partie de la garde du château et parmi eux, la famille Impériale devait en choisir un pour en faire leur chevalier personnel. Mais un homonculus résista au sort de l’Empereur: Mikhaelis Agnito.

Il organisa une rébellion, souleva les homonculus contre l’empire et exécuta toute la famille Impériale à l’exception de la 7ᵉ princesse, Evenrose et la 8ᵉ princesse, Rosenite. Cette dernière, éperdument amoureuse de Mikhaelis, croyait qu’elle portait en elle le «résultat de leur amour.» Elle pensait être exceptionnelle mais elle n’était en vie qu’uniquement parce qu’elle avait subit une expérience avec la pierre philosophale, qui ne fonctionnait seulement qu’avec le sang royal. Une simple marionnette que Mikhaelis pouvait contrôler à sa guise.

Cependant, le traître avait des sentiments pour Evenrose, car elle était différente. Elle était contre l’utilisation des homonculus comme esclaves et étudia durement pour leur rendre leur liberté, faisant d’elle le mouton noir de la famille Impériale. Malheureusement, elle ne comprit pas les actions de Mikhaelis et croyait qu’elle allait se faire exécuter comme les siens.
Rosenite en profita pour venir la voir et l’empoisonner, se réjouissant de la mort de sa demi-sœur, pensant avoir Mikhaelis pour elle seule. En apprenant la nouvelle de la mort d’Evenrose, Mikhaelis tente alors par tous les moyens de la ressusciter. Un mage lui proposa un moyen: celui de retourner dans le temps. Néanmoins, seule Evenrose gardera les souvenirs de tout ce qui c’était passé jusqu’à présent. Mikhaelis accepta sans sourciller, du moment que sa bien aimée était en vie. Quand le sort se lança, Evenrose ouvrit les yeux et se retrouva 8 ans en arrière.

Sera-t-elle capable de changer son destin?

---

description.id:
Putri kekaisaran ketujuh, Evenrose, pernah meninggal. Kenangan terakhirnya adalah tentang keluarga kerajaan yang dihancurkan oleh Homunculus, para budak yang memberontak, dan tentang saudara perempuannya yang telah memihak para pemberontak dan mendesaknya untuk melarikan diri dari eksekusi menyakitkannya dengan menelan racun. Tapi ketika dia membuka matanya lagi, "Aku... aku tidak mati." Dia menyadari bahwa dia telah pergi delapan tahun yang lalu, kembali ke masa sebelum saudara perempuannya yang kejam, Bridgette, dipilih sebagai kaisar berikutnya. Diberi kesempatan untuk mencegah jatuhnya keluarga kekaisaran dengan dipilih sendiri sebagai kaisar berikutnya, dia memutuskan untuk menulis artikelnya sendiri tentang Michael, raja Homunculus dan monster penjara umum, untuk memenangkan hati kaisar. "Aku membutuhkanmu, Michael. Sangat buruk." Akankah Evenrose bisa mendapatkannya dan melindungi keluarga kekaisaran dengan aman?

La settima principessa imperiale, Evienrose, una volta morì e l'ultima cosa che ricorda fu quando la famiglia reale venne distrutta dagli Homunculi, e il tradimento della sorellina. Ma quando riaprì gli occhi si rende conto di essere tornata nel passato e di avere otto anni in meno, e ha così l'opportunità di impedire la caduta della famiglia imperiale incalzando il terzo imperatore Bridgette e facendosi riconoscere come successore. Come parte del piano, Evienrose ha deciso di avere dalla sua parte Mikhaelis Agnito, il futuro re degli Homunculus. "Ho bisogno di te, Mikhaelis." Riuscirà Evienrose a riuscirci e a proteggere la famiglia imperiale?

人造人間「ホムンクルス」の反乱によって滅びたハーデルラミド皇室。第7皇女イヴは妹の裏切りによって１度は命を落としたものの、錬金術の力で８年前の世界で再び目を覚ます。 イヴが皇室滅亡の未来を変えるための方法―それは皇室を滅亡に追い込んだホムンクルスの王・ミカエルを自らの専属騎士にすることだった。 皇女と反逆者、前世ではすれ違ってばかりだった２人が向かう未来とは——！

7황녀 이뷔엔로즈는 한 번 죽음을 맞이했다.그녀의 마지막 기억은 반역을 일으킨 호문클루스들에 의해 황실이 망하고그들의 편에 선 동생의 계략에 빠져 독약을 삼키고 죽었던 기억이었다. 그런데“나…… 안 죽었어……?”다시 눈을 떴을 때, 그녀는 자신이 8살이나 어려진 채 과거로 돌아왔다는 사실을 깨닫는다.그것도 다음 대 후계자가 되는 3황녀가 정식으로 후계자로 낙점되기 전으로.‘이건 기회야.’3황녀 브리지테를 누르고 후계자로 인정받아 황실의 몰락을 막을 기회.그 대비의 일환으로 이브는 황제의 마음을 얻고 자신의 가능성을 시험하기 위해호문클루스들의 왕이자 공중감옥의 괴물 ‘미카엘’을 자신의 기사로 들이기로 하는데.“미카엘 그대가 필요해. 아주 절실하게 말이야.”과연 이뷔엔로즈는 그를 얻고, 무사히 황실을 지켜낼 수 있을까.

在霍文克鲁斯的带领下，皇室走向了灭亡。第七皇女伊维安洛斯被他们控制在一旁，在妹妹的见证下服毒而死。 再次睁眼时却回到了8年前。为了防止皇室的没落，她决定亲自撰写文章，讲述霍文克鲁斯的首领，亦是公共监狱的怪物-‘米卡尔’的故事。 “我需要你，米卡尔。非常迫切。”

description.en:
From elves, fairies, slimes, gift items, devils and more, countless and thousands of reincarnations have led to a new life. I, Lee Seo Jun, have been reborn as a human child!

In the library of my life, where memories of my previous lives remain like fairy tales, I happen to see a past life with the dream life I desperately wanted. On top of that, I’ve been given abilities that grabs people’s attention!

With my hansome face doing all the hard work! My insane acting skills! This time, at long last, I will achieve my dream and become a superstar!

Wet’s dow it! (Baby Accent)

This is a test that puts your life at stake. Pass the test and survive. When the two-faced examiner Qin Jiu meets the cold examinee You Huo, the two amnesiacs are put head to head in a fight by the inhumane system. However, they form a tactic agreement. The system collapses after a series of warnings and the erased memories gradually become clearer. It turns out that at the end of this smoke-filled world, you are still the first person I met. The world is brilliant and grand. Welcome home.

This is a girls love series. When a delinquent and a role model student start dating, they must conceal their relationship because of their reputations. People would be outraged and not approve of such a couple. Even though Alix and Skip are complete opposites like night and day, they manage to maintain a loving relationship.

title.en: The Brilliant Healer's New Life in the Shadows

altTitles.ja: 一瞬で治療していたのに役立たずと追放された天才治癒師、闇ヒーラーとして楽しく生きる

description.en: Born a poor man in the slums, Zenos never had opportunities in life, so he decides to forge his own opportunities by teaching himself the curative arts after a chance encounter with a healer. When an adventuring party led by a man named Aston extends him an invitation, Zenos is elated—only to then be treated like dirt by his teammates. Despite Zenos’s diligent efforts to hone his skills to nothing short of perfection, the party deems him useless and kicks him out. Bereft of money and options, Zenos starts an illegal clinic and becomes a shadow healer. Word of his healing genius spreads quickly throughout the city’s underbelly, and as his reputation grows among the dregs of society, knowledge of Zenos's esteem reaches the wrong ears...

title.en: Shachiku Kensei, Haishinsha ni naru - Black Guild Kaishain, Ukkari Kaishayou Kaisen de S-kyuu Monster wo Aite ni Musou suru Tokoro wo Zenkoku Haishin shite shimau

altTitles.en: The Corporate Slave Sword Master Becomes a Broadcaster
Workaholic Master Swordsman Becomes a Distributor
Black Guild Company Employee Carelessly Broadcasts a Video of Him Fighting an S-class Monster on a Company Line Nationwide ~Corporate S*ave Sword Saint Becomes a Broadcaster~

description.en:
“Getting a job is the grave of life…” sighs Tanaka Makoto, an office worker belonging to a black guild, as he takes on a dungeon for work again today. 

One day, he makes a mistake in the broadcast settings for recording work, and broadcasts his dungeon capture to the whole country. A single blow from the Tyrant Dragon?! Tanaka, a sword master in the modern age, shows off his extraordinary skills, and the broadcast turns into a festival! 

"100 million concurrent viewers…?!"

Tanaka, who unexpectedly becomes an incredibly popular broadcaster, quits his black workplace and becomes an independent broadcaster. 

Now it’s time for work. The former corporate slave’s life of dungeon broadcasting begins!

altTitles.en: The Demon Lord Levels Up With Martial Arts

description.en:
Now that the demonic realm and the heavenly realm have called a truce, the human world has returned to an era of peace.

Jeon Minchul lives the life of an ordinary college student until the day he comes across an artifact from the war and remembers — in his past life, he was the demon king who brought the world to its knees.

Upon recalling these memories, Minchul awakens his old powers, along with some new ones. But can this demon king harness the powers of both good and evil to protect the peace?

description.en:
Who died at that time... Which one?

John is red-haired and freckled. His only pride is that he is a close friend of the school's popular twins, Jekyll and Hyde. The twins always pretended to be each other, but suddenly one of the twins died. Who was left... Which one!?

title.en: The Game That I Came From

altTitles.ja: ふりだしから始まる覚醒者

description.en:
With the rise of a popular RPG called Tianyong Game, its max-level players called "awakeners" have come to dominate the real world in terms of wealth and power. 

Despite Ling Ce's natural talent for the game, it's nearly impossible for him to catch up to these players because he started playing the game a year after its release. But as luck would have it, a glitch in the game's teleportation system takes him back three years into the past with his memories intact.

Now, Ling Ce is determined to utilize his knowledge and experiences to become an awakener and turn his life around. No amount of carnivorous plant monsters or insanity level dungeons will stop the determined hero from reaching the peak!


---

description.zh: 带着上一世满级盗贼的记忆，回到三年前，这是命运给凌策的考验还是赏赐？ 既然重生，那上一世未曾达到的、不能守护的、那些只能幻想的，这一世全都要。 更以巅峰造极之态，摧枯拉朽之势，超越极限，成为最强“觉醒者”。
